name: MTI Systems
tag_list: manufacturing, estimating, cost-estimating, quoting, process-planning, oem, job-shops, precision-machining, precision-fabricating
overview:
MTI Systems provides cost estimating, quoting and process planning software, as well as estimation services to the manufacturing industry.

Job shops, contract manufacturers, precsion machining and fabrication…essentially any supplier who manufacturers parts, as welll as OEMs (original equipment manufactuers.)

Companies worldwide use the estimating software to identify manufacturing cycle time through multiple estimating methods, including parametric and the use of formula based cost models.
